TextBlock.Text: miny: the icey outer-most moon that also acts as a shepard moon to MagMag's rings. being positioned at the rings, it ofcourse has accumulated the debris at the sides, creating a unique shape.
this moon being the farthest kinda reminds of those dwarf planets that are super far from their parent star, positioned in asteroid belts
it's actually pretty cool seeing the rings from here. especially when seeing yourself pass through the rings whilst on Miny
side note: unless you have something to get you back down, don't jump on this moon
